getOutputStream().Description: Returns an output stream which can send data to a remote node. The stream should be closed when no longer needed. This method will only return null if this result's The returned stream will throw @B_java#io#IOException_E@ on write if any connection errors occur. This exception might be a @B_com#google#android#gms#wearable#ChannelIOException_E@. Data written to this stream is buffered. If you wish to send the current data without waiting for the buffer to fill up, Multiple calls to this method will return the same instance.
